name: Handle With Care
description:
What an incredible opportunity for you, to be now a trainee in our museum, for the first time in history we have gathered the two biggest collection of ancient relics in ONE ROOM!
Your work is to put the last three relics in their assigned place. Go now!

The Director

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 37: "One Room"

Twitter | Email

#LDJAM

All the contents were created during the 72 hours except for the followings:

Music by Kevin MacLeod - incompetech.com
Sound Effects by sonniss - sonniss.com
